title: Negotiate Annual Pricing with a Supplier
description: It's time for the annual price negotiation with a key supplier. A procurement manager must negotiate for better terms.

tasks.description: Analyze the total purchase volume with the supplier over the last year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that purchase volume has increased by 20%.

tasks.description: Research market rates for the supplier's products to use as leverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that competitors offer similar products at a lower price.

tasks.description: Contact the supplier and use the data to negotiate a 5% price reduction for the upcoming year.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supplier agrees to the price reduction.

tasks.description: Update the pricing for the supplier's products in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the cost for all of the supplier's items.
